docs.snippet: Following his team’s loss to Miami in Game 2 of the Eastern Conference finals, Paul George said he had blacked out after taking a blow to the head from Dwyane Wade’s knee....
docs.lead_paragraph: Following his team’s loss to Miami in Game 2 of the Eastern Conference finals, Paul George said he had blacked out after taking a blow to the head from Dwyane Wade’s knee.
docs.abstract: Indiana Pacers guard Paul George sustains concussion during team's Game 2 victory over Miami Heat in Eastern Conference finals, which is now tied at a game apiece; George must complete several NBA-mandated procedures before he can return to the court.

docs.snippet: Tony Parker, Manu Ginobili and Tim Duncan have played their entire N.B.A. careers with the San Antonio Spurs, who year after year have continued to be championship contenders....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tony Parker, Manu Ginobili and Tim Duncan have played their entire N.B.A. careers with the San Antonio Spurs, who year after year have continued to be championship contenders.
docs.abstract: Veteran players Tony Parker, Manu Ginobili and Tim Duncan have played their entire NBA careers with the San Antonio Spurs, who year after year continue to be championship contenders; men are in pursuit of a fourth championship together, as they face Oklahoma city Thunder in the Western Conference finals.

headline.main: Ageless Veterans Are Still Giving Spurs Extra Kick
headline.print_headline: Ageless Veterans Are Still Giving Spurs Extra Kick

docs.snippet: Tony Parker scored 22 points, and the Spurs used a dominant third quarter to beat the Thunder and take a 2-0 lead in the Western Conference finals....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tony Parker scored 22 points, and the Spurs used a dominant third quarter to beat the Thunder and take a 2-0 lead in the Western Conference finals.
docs.abstract: San Antonio Spurs defeat Oklahoma City Thunder, 112-77, to lead Western Conference finals, 2-0.

headline.main: Spurs Again Rout Thunder to Take a 2-0 Lead
headline.print_headline: Parker Leads Spurs in Rout of Thunder

docs.snippet: Five acres devoted to sports and outdoor activities will be unveiled in Brooklyn amid a season of controversy over the park’s uses....
docs.lead_paragraph: Five acres devoted to sports and outdoor activities will be unveiled in Brooklyn amid a season of controversy over the park’s uses.
docs.abstract: Controversy persists over use of Brooklyn Bridge Park as pier devoted to sports and outdoor activities is unveiled there; city plan to build affordable and luxury housing in park to help cover its operating costs has triggered protests from residents of nearby neighborhoods, who say park should not be overshadowed by apartment towers.

headline.main: Celebrating New Pier While Debating Park’s Uses
headline.print_headline: Celebrating New Pier While Debating Park’s Uses

docs.lead_paragraph: As Romeo said: "My bounty is as boundless as the sea ... the more I give to thee, the more I have." His modern-day counterparts — the kind with deep pockets — are going all out to offer extravagant, star-studded weddings to their own Juliets.
